definition: this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)

sentences.english: Although, only a human mind could invent something as insipid as love.
sentences.chinese: 儘管，只有人類思維才發明得出愛情這般乏味的東西。

sentences.english: It seems a bit idealist for me to think of money and private properties.
sentences.chinese: 我如此這般看待金錢和私有財產，似乎有些理想主義。

sentences.english: He has never expected a touch to be so mysteriously arousing.
sentences.chinese: 他從沒料到一個觸碰能這般神祕地激起內心的激情。

sentences.english: Will I ever again experience such peace?
sentences.chinese: 我還能再次體味這般寧靜嗎？

sentences.english: But how could the Danube compare with such limpidity ?
sentences.chinese: 可是多瑙河，哪能有她這般清澈？

sentences.english: But can memories bloom in a desert like this?
sentences.chinese: 但是記憶之花能在這般荒漠中盛開嗎？

sentences.english: If I is so cool and thin long.
sentences.chinese: 我是否就這般涼薄了很久。

sentences.english: Youth is always so short, such as the wind died in September.
sentences.chinese: 青春總是這般短暫，如那年的風一般消逝在九月。

sentences.english: But this tactic fails in the face of a movement that defies such simple categorisation.
sentences.chinese: 但此策略無法直面一項反抗這般簡單分類的運動。

sentences.english: So much so that we resent anyone who dampens our excitement.
sentences.chinese: 如此這般以至於我們不滿任何挫傷我們興奮之情的人。

sentences.english: Having thus mastered addition, they move on to subtraction.
sentences.chinese: 如此這般地掌握了加法之後，他們又轉向減法。

sentences.english: Calm and steady dispassion , seldom be like today like this nervous.
sentences.chinese: 沉着冷靜，很少像今天這般慌張。

sentences.english: It is said that describing about 100 pedestrians will exercise out the ability.
sentences.chinese: 據說描寫100位路人就能鍛煉出這般道行。

sentences.english: Medical emergency-room dramas will never be the same again.
sentences.chinese: 如此這般，急診室的劇幕必將不復從前。

sentences.english: Born of the true Dhamma, endowed with such virtues as good practice.
sentences.chinese: 由真法而生，有這般善行修持的功德。

sentences.english: As docile as she seems today, that lioness was once a ferocious beast.
sentences.chinese: 那母獅子原是隻兇猛的野獸，今天牠卻這般溫順。

definition: let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
a modal particle indicating (don't mind it, ok)
a modal particle indicating (that's all, only, nothing much)
to feel embarrassed or awkward/to make things difficult (for someone)/to find things difficult (to do or manage)
old variant of 愷|恺[kai3]/old variant of 凱|凯[kai3]
